articles.description: Jose Siri, acquired a year ago from Houston, sparks the winning rally with a leadoff double and scores on a sacrifice fly by Yandy Diaz in his return to action.
articles.content:
HOUSTON There were a lot of little victories being acknowledged after the Rays rallied in the ninth inning Friday to defeat the Astros 4-3.
Most notably by Jose Siri, the former Astro who basked in … [+4784 chars]
